usageEnglish: I eat an apple every day.
She bought a red apple from the store.
The apple fell from the tree during the storm.
I like to eat a banana after lunch.
She peeled the banana and ate it quickly.
Bananas are rich in potassium.
usageTurkish: Öğle yemeğinden sonra muz yemeyi seviyorum.

usageEnglish: I squeezed an orange to make fresh juice.
Oranges are a great source of Vitamin C.
The orange tree in our garden is full of fruit.
usageTurkish: Taze meyve suyu yapmak için bir portakal sıktım.
Portakallar mükemmel bir C vitamini kaynağıdır.

usageEnglish: We picked fresh strawberries from the farm.
Strawberries are delicious when added to yogurt.
She made a strawberry cake for the party.
usageTurkish: Parti için bir çilekli kek yaptı.

usageEnglish: We had watermelon at the picnic.
Watermelon is perfect for hot summer days.
He cut the watermelon into slices.
usageTurkish: Karpuz sıcak yaz günleri için mükemmeldir.

usageEnglish: She bought a bunch of grapes from the market.
Grapes can be made into wine.
The children enjoyed eating grapes in the garden.
usageTurkish: Çocuklar bahçede üzüm yemekten keyif aldı.

usageEnglish: She added pineapple to the fruit salad.
Pineapple has a sweet and tangy flavor.
He bought a fresh pineapple from the store.
usageTurkish: Ananas tatlı ve ekşi bir tada sahiptir.

usageEnglish: The peach was soft and juicy.
She made a peach cobbler for dessert.
I prefer eating fresh peaches in the summer.
usageTurkish: Yazın taze şeftali yemeyi tercih ederim.

usageEnglish: We picked cherries from the tree.
She loves cherry-flavored ice cream.
The cherries were bright red and sweet.
I squeezed lemon juice into my tea.
Lemons are often used in salad dressings.
He made lemonade from fresh lemons.
Plums are in season during the summer.
She ate a ripe plum after dinner.
The plum tree in our garden has grown tall.
usageTurkish: Akşam yemeğinden sonra olgun bir erik yedi.

usageEnglish: Figs are sweet and often eaten dried.
She used figs in her homemade jam.
I bought some fresh figs from the market.
usageTurkish: İncirler tatlıdır ve genellikle kuru olarak yenir.

usageEnglish: Pomegranate seeds are delicious in salads.
She drank pomegranate juice for breakfast.
The pomegranate tree is full of fruit in the autumn.
She served melon as a refreshing dessert.
The melon was sweet and juicy.
We bought a melon from the farmer's market.
usageTurkish: Serinletici bir tatlı olarak kavun servis etti.

usageEnglish: I read a book last night.
This book is about world history.
He is writing a book on environmental issues.
usageTurkish: Çevre sorunları hakkında bir kitap yazıyor.

usageEnglish: I have a blue car.
The car stopped at the red light.
The new electric car can drive over 300 miles on a single charge.
usageTurkish: Yeni elektrikli araba tek şarjla 300 milin üzerinde yol alabiliyor.

usageEnglish: The table is made of wood.
She placed the dishes on the table.
They discussed the plan around the conference table.
I need a pen to sign the paper.
The pen ran out of ink.
He wrote a letter using his favorite fountain pen.
usageTurkish: Kağıdı imzalamak için bir kaleme ihtiyacım var.
En sevdiği dolma kalemle bir mektup yazdı.

usageEnglish: She bought a new computer.
The computer is very fast.
He is working on a complex software project on his computer.
usageTurkish: Bilgisayarında karmaşık bir yazılım projesi üzerinde çalışıyor.

usageEnglish: The cat is sleeping on the couch.
My cat loves to play with the yarn.
The black cat quickly climbed the tall tree.
usageTurkish: Siyah kedi hızlıca yüksek ağaca tırmandı.

usageEnglish: I have a small dog.
The dog barked at the stranger.
The dog quickly learned the new trick.
Please drink some water.
The water in the lake is very clear.
He poured a glass of water from the pitcher.
I like to eat fresh bread.
The bakery sells delicious bread.
He spread butter on the warm slice of bread.
usageTurkish: Sıcak ekmek diliminin üzerine tereyağı sürdü.

usageEnglish: The flower is red.
She picked a beautiful flower from the garden.
The flowers in the field bloom in the spring.
She wears glasses.
I need my glasses to read.
His new glasses have a blue light filter for computer screens.
usageTurkish: Yeni gözlüklerinde mavi ışık filtresi var.

usageEnglish: I use my phone to call my friend.
The phone rang during the meeting.
She sent a message through her phone’s messaging app.
usageTurkish: Mesajlaşma uygulaması aracılığıyla bir mesaj gönderdi.

usageEnglish: This is a tall building.
The office is located in the tallest building downtown.
The building was constructed using eco-friendly materials.
usageTurkish: Ofis şehir merkezindeki en yüksek binada yer alıyor.
Bina çevre dostu malzemelerle inşa edildi.

usageEnglish: The plane is landing.
They boarded the plane early.
The plane flew over the mountains and through the clouds.
usageTurkish: Uçak dağların üzerinden ve bulutların arasından geçti.

usageEnglish: I ride my bicycle every day.
She bought a new bicycle for her commute.
His bicycle is equipped with gears for mountain biking.
usageTurkish: İşe gitmek için yeni bir bisiklet aldı.
Bisikletinde dağ bisikleti için vitesler var.

usageEnglish: My hand is cold.
She raised her hand to ask a question.
He offered his hand to help her up after she fell.
The sun is shining.
The sun sets in the west.
The sun’s rays provide energy for the plants to grow.
usageTurkish: Güneş ışınları bitkilerin büyümesi için enerji sağlar.

usageEnglish: I carry a bag to school.
She packed her lunch in a small bag.
The bag was heavy with books and supplies.
usageTurkish: Öğle yemeğini küçük bir çantaya koydu.

usageEnglish: I sleep in my bed.
The bed is very comfortable.
She made the bed with clean sheets and a warm blanket.
usageTurkish: Temiz çarşaflar ve sıcak bir battaniye ile yatağı yaptı.

usageEnglish: I wear my shoes to school.
Her new shoes are very comfortable.
He tied the laces on his running shoes tightly before the race.
usageTurkish: Koşu ayakkabılarının bağcıklarını yarış öncesi sıkıca bağladı.

usageEnglish: I sit on a chair.
The chair in the living room is very soft.
He bought a new office chair for better back support.
usageTurkish: Daha iyi sırt desteği için yeni bir ofis sandalyesi aldı.

usageEnglish: I love eating Italian food.
The food was delicious and fresh.
They donated food to the local shelter every week.
usageTurkish: Her hafta yerel barınağa yemek bağışladılar.

usageEnglish: Close the door, please.
The door is painted red.
The front door creaked as it opened slowly.
Open the window for fresh air.
She looked out the window and saw the rain.
The window shattered when the ball hit it.
usageTurkish: Temiz hava almak için pencereyi aç.

usageEnglish: The tree is very tall.
The tree in my backyard grows apples.
In the fall, the leaves of the tree turn bright orange.
usageTurkish: Sonbaharda, ağacın yaprakları parlak turuncuya döner.

usageEnglish: I take the bus to school.
The bus was late this morning.
He missed the bus and had to walk home.
usageTurkish: Otobüsü kaçırdı ve eve yürümek zorunda kaldı.

usageEnglish: The sea is calm today.
We sailed across the sea to a nearby island.
The sea is home to many different marine species.
usageTurkish: Yakındaki bir adaya deniz üzerinden yelken açtık.
Deniz birçok farklı deniz canlısına ev sahipliği yapar.

usageEnglish: We went to the park to play.
The park is full of people on weekends.
They took a long walk through the park at sunset.
usageTurkish: Gün batımında parkta uzun bir yürüyüş yaptılar.

usageEnglish: The mountain is covered in snow.
We hiked up the mountain trail.
The view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
The meeting starts at 10 AM.
We had a long meeting about the new project.
The meeting concluded with a detailed action plan.
usageTurkish: Yeni proje hakkında uzun bir toplantı yaptık.
Toplantı, ayrıntılı bir eylem planı ile sonuçlandı.

usageEnglish: I am a student at the university.
The student asked a question during the lecture.
She is the top student in her class, always excelling in exams.
usageTurkish: Öğrenci ders sırasında bir soru sordu.
Sınıfın en iyi öğrencisi, her zaman sınavlarda başarılı oluyor.

usageEnglish: I attend university in the city.
The university offers many different courses.
He graduated from one of the top universities in the country.
usageTurkish: Ülkenin en iyi üniversitelerinden birinden mezun oldu.

usageEnglish: He is a foreigner in this country.
The foreigner asked for directions to the nearest hotel.
As a foreigner, it took him some time to adjust to the new culture.
usageTurkish: Yabancı, en yakın otele nasıl gideceğini sordu.
Bir yabancı olarak, yeni kültüre alışması biraz zaman aldı.

usageEnglish: Success requires hard work.
She achieved great success in her career.
His success is a result of years of dedication and perseverance.
usageTurkish: Başarısı, yılların adanmışlık ve sabrının bir sonucudur.

usageEnglish: I want to improve my English.
He worked hard to improve his performance at work.
The new system was designed to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
usageTurkish: İşyerinde performansını artırmak için çok çalıştı.
Yeni sistem, verimliliği artırmak ve maliyetleri düşürmek için tasarlandı.

usageEnglish: Technology is advancing rapidly.
The new technology has revolutionized the industry.
He is researching how technology can improve healthcare systems.
usageTurkish: Sağlık sistemlerini iyileştirmek için teknolojinin nasıl kullanılacağını araştırıyor.

usageEnglish: I love listening to music.
She plays music on her guitar every evening.
The music industry has changed drastically with the rise of streaming services.
usageTurkish: Müzik endüstrisi, yayın hizmetlerinin yükselişiyle birlikte büyük ölçüde değişti.

usageEnglish: We had a short conversation.
Their conversation lasted for hours.
The conversation covered a wide range of topics, from politics to philosophy.
usageTurkish: Sohbet, politikadan felsefeye kadar geniş bir yelpazeyi kapsıyordu.

usageEnglish: Nature is beautiful.
We spent the day exploring nature in the national park.
The beauty of nature can inspire creativity and calm the mind.
usageTurkish: Milli parkta doğayı keşfederek bir gün geçirdik.
Doğanın güzelliği yaratıcılığı teşvik edebilir ve zihni sakinleştirebilir.

usageEnglish: I love to explore new places.
They set out to explore the unknown regions of the forest.
He spent years exploring the depths of the ocean in search of new species.
usageTurkish: Ormanın bilinmeyen bölgelerini keşfetmek için yola çıktılar.
Okyanusun derinliklerini keşfederek yeni türler aradı.

usageEnglish: Every country has its own culture.
We learned a lot about Japanese culture during our visit.
The festival celebrates the rich and diverse culture of the local community.
usageTurkish: Japonya'yı ziyaretimiz sırasında Japon kültürü hakkında çok şey öğrendik.
Festival, yerel topluluğun zengin ve çeşitli kültürünü kutluyor.

usageEnglish: I had a great experience at the event.
The trip was a memorable experience.
His years of experience in the field made him the ideal candidate for the job.
usageTurkish: Sahadaki yıllara dayanan deneyimi, onu bu iş için ideal aday yaptı.

usageEnglish: He is studying philosophy at university.
Philosophy explores fundamental questions about life and existence.
Her book offers a new perspective on ancient Greek philosophy.
usageTurkish: Felsefe, hayat ve varoluşla ilgili temel soruları araştırır.
Kitabı, antik Yunan felsefesine yeni bir bakış açısı sunuyor.

usageEnglish: We went on a vacation last summer.
The family planned a two-week vacation in Italy.
They spent their vacation exploring the hidden beaches of the tropical island.
usageTurkish: Aile İtalya'da iki haftalık bir tatil planladı.
Tatilini tropikal adanın gizli plajlarını keşfederek geçirdiler.

usageEnglish: The economy is growing.
Experts are analyzing the effects of inflation on the global economy.
The country’s economy relies heavily on exports and international trade.
usageTurkish: Uzmanlar, enflasyonun küresel ekonomi üzerindeki etkilerini analiz ediyor.
Ülkenin ekonomisi büyük ölçüde ihracat ve uluslararası ticarete dayanıyor.

usageEnglish: The problem’s complexity makes it hard to solve.
The complexity of the issue requires careful consideration.
His research focuses on the complexity of human behavior and decision-making.
usageTurkish: Araştırması, insan davranışı ve karar verme sürecinin karmaşıklığına odaklanıyor.

usageEnglish: We need a new strategy.
The company's strategy focuses on long-term growth.
Developing an effective strategy requires a deep understanding of the market.
usageTurkish: Şirketin stratejisi uzun vadeli büyümeye odaklanıyor.
Etkili bir strateji geliştirmek, piyasayı derinlemesine anlamayı gerektirir.

usageEnglish: We did an analysis of the data.
The report includes an in-depth analysis of the financial statements.
His analysis of the situation provided valuable insights for the project.
usageTurkish: Rapor, mali tabloların derinlemesine bir analizini içeriyor.
Durumun analizi, projeye değerli bilgiler sağladı.

usageEnglish: Planning is important for success.
She is responsible for planning the event.
Effective planning ensures that resources are allocated efficiently.
usageTurkish: Etkili planlama, kaynakların verimli bir şekilde tahsis edilmesini sağlar.
